_sText:
Sorry for the slight map spam. I decided to edit a good part of the map bhop_helvete2 that I made around 2 months ago back in November. I felt like the map was poorly made and that I should of never released the original map. My main gripe was how the last stage looked. It was cringeworthy seeing people play it simply because of that one stage. So I ended up putting a decent bit of work into this and fixing it up. I also added a new stage so that the map felt slightly different to play if you've already played it. Also, most skips are still possible. I decided to re-release this as another map and not update the original bhop_helvete2 upload, due to the fact that the changes I made were important. Changelog below

  • Massively improved the end stage.
  • Added a short, new stage.
  • Added a 15-20s bonus.
  • Implemented various quality of life changes.
  • Fixed the transparency issue with some of the textures.
  • Patched out SOME skips.
  • Added a few indicators and other small visibility changes.
  • Optimized the map more.

I hope that the changes I made improve the map. hf hf
